subject: Economy
question_en: What is the significance of the Indian economic system?
question_hi: भारत की आयात्वान का मानना क्या है?
explanation_en: The Indian economy is considered an independent mixed economy as it combines elements of both socialism and capitalism while maintaining its autonomy.
explanation_hi: भारतीय आयात्वान सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान
explanation_en: The Indian economy is a mixed economy that combines elements of both socialism and capitalism and maintains its autonomy.
explanation_hi: भारतीय आयात्वान विभिज्ञान के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान
explanation_en: Independent mixed economy with elements of both socialism and capitalism
explanation_hi: भारत के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान
explanation_en: The Indian economy is a mixed economy that includes elements of both socialism and capitalism and maintains its autonomy.
explanation_hi: भारत के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान के सामर्थ्य विभिज्ञान
